name: Bingo MB
description:
Bingo MB is an app that is used to generate numbers between one and seventy five. Any player can be the "caller" using the Bingo MB app. As the numbers are selected by Bingo MB, players mark off that number on their scorecards. As each number is selected by Bingo MB, it is also displayed on the master board for verification purposes or to confirm an actual winner when Bingo is called by a player.

Bingo MB is a fun game to play with friends and family. Good luck and enjoy.
